name: Next Life
content: Call it bad luck
Call it distance
We're all out of calls for help
But I'm gonna tell myself
I would be yours you would be mine
Maybe we just need one more try
Call me crazy
But I'm holding
In ten years or maybe twelve
And all I can tell myself
I would be yours you would be mine
Maybe we just need one more try
In the next life
In the next life
In the next life mm mm mm mm
In the next life
In the next life
In the next life mm mm mm mm
I would be yours you would be mine
Maybe we just need one more try
